New Records: Chicago White Sox snapped Chris Flexen's 20 consecutive losses streak, an MLB record
Key Match Events: Chicago White Sox scored five runs in the ninth inning for a comeback win
Dominic Fletcher drove in the go-ahead RBI single
Post-Match Reflections: Chicago White Sox interim manager Grady Sizemore praised the team's clean play and clutch performances
Miscellaneous Highlights: Korey Lee showcased a strong arm and clutch defense
Dominic Fletcher spoke on adapting to shadowy conditions in the batter's box
